div.class: left column twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
left column twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
page-block-content page-block-content-1 left twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
div.p: If you are new to the Hamilton School District, the “Enrolling Your Child” page will take you through the enrollment and registration process with helpful information about the documents you will need, school attendance areas and Wisconsin health requirements for students.

div.class: left column twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
left column twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
page-block-content page-block-content-2 left twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
div.p: Hamilton High School’s Class of 2019 had a composite score well above the state average on the ACT college admissions exam.

div.class: left column twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
left column twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12

h3.a: All Hamilton schools get top rating in State Report Card

div.class: page-block-content page-block-content-3 left twelve large-12 medium-12 small-12
div.p: See latest Wisconsin School Report Card. All schools in the district were rated the highest 5-star “significantly exceeds expectations.”

div.class: content-area right eight large-8 medium-8 small-12
news-events left columns large-6 medium-12 small-12

ul.li:
Hamilton named to America’s best high school list
Apr 24, 2020 For the sixth consecutive year, Hamilton High School was named to U. More

Hamilton drama student wins Jerry Award
Apr 23, 2020 Hamilton High School senior Jadyn Grana was awarded the Jerry Spirit Award More

Baldwin named state basketball player of the year
Apr 3, 2020 Hamilton student-athlete Patrick Baldwin, Jr. was named Wisconsin Boys Basketball Player of More

Marcy earns state recognition for achievement
Apr 3, 2020 Marcy Elementary School is among 11 high-achieving schools in the state recognized through More

div.class: top wpfront-bottom-shadow
wpfront-fixed

p.b: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Hamilton schools have been closed since March 16. Beginning March 30, all students will engage in learning from home.

div.a: Visit our Coronavirus Response Page for more info.
